items.name: Rogan Josh
items.description: A fragrant Kashmiri dish featuring tender pieces of lamb cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy made with yogurt, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of Kashmiri spices. Served with rice or naan for a hearty meal.

items.name: Chole Bhature
items.description: A classic Punjabi dish consisting of spicy chickpea curry (chole) served with fluffy deep-fried bread (bhature). This indulgent combination is often enjoyed as a hearty breakfast or satisfying meal.
